g.text: 365 nm UV lamp (B-100A, UVP, LLC, CA) was used to shine
phosphors for optical photographs. LEDs devices were fabricated by
applying a 25 wt % phosphor slurry composed of the phosphor
powder and Dow Corning OE-6550 silicone on top of a blue-emitting
InGaN based LED mounted in a 2835 PLCC package (Power Opto
Co., Taiwan), followed by thermal curing of the LEDs package on a
